attributes.review:
so I got the app and immediately was disturbed beyond my core when I saw donald trump’s face. after I eventually got over the horrendous disgust that overwhelmed me, I was sent a verification code to activate my phone number. the activation code had “666” in it!!! it’s a sign!!! so after I set me first name to ftrump and my last name to 2020, I continued on and registered to attend a rally, reserving a space that I will not be able to attend. anyways, this app is a piece of trash and does not deserve to be on the app store!! ✨🧚‍♀️✨🙃
yeah❤️
attributes.title: ftrump2020

attributes.review:
i opened this app and my eye sight got even worse :,( I saw that disgusting cheeto 🤮 imma send the White House my bill for my new contacts 🥰 anyways I had to blessed my eyes so I had to go watch one direction music videos :) Stan one direction including their solos❤️ Stan Liam Payne, Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Louis Tomlinson and Harry Styles😍 

What Makes You Beautiful- One Direction
[Verse 1: Liam]
You're insecure, don't know what for
You're turning heads when you walk through the door
Don't need makeup to cover up
Being the way that you are is enough

[Pre-Chorus: Harry]
Everyone else in the room can see it
Everyone else but you

[Chorus: All]
Baby, you light up my world like nobody else
The way that you flip your hair gets me overwhelmed
But when you smile at the ground, it ain't hard to tell
You don't know, oh, oh, you don't know you're beautiful
If only you saw what I can see
You'll understand why I want you so desperately
Right now I'm looking at you and I can't believe
You don't know, you don't know you're beautiful
That's what makes you beautiful
[Verse 2: Zayn]
So c-come on, you got it wrong
To prove I'm right, I put it in a song
I don't know why you're being shy
And turn away when I look into your eyes

[Pre-Chorus: Harry]
Everyone else in the room can see it
Everyone else but you

[Chorus: All]
Baby, you light up my world like nobody else (Nobody else)
The way that you flip your hair gets me overwhelmed
But when you smile at the ground, it ain't hard to tell
You don't know, oh, oh, you don't know you're beautiful (Oh)
If only you saw what I can see
You'll understand why I want you so desperately
Right now I'm looking at you and I can't believe
You don't know, you don't know you're beautiful
That's what makes you beautiful

[Bridge: All]
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na na na
Na na na na na na na na na na na na na na na

[Breakdown: Harry]
Baby, you light up my world like nobody else
The way that you flip your hair gets me overwhelmed
But when you smile at the ground, it ain't hard to tell
You don't know, oh-oh, you don't know you're beautiful

[Chorus: All]
Baby, you light up my world like nobody else
The way that you flip your hair gets me overwhelmed
But when you smile at the ground (ground), it ain't hard to tell
You don't know, oh-oh, you don't know you're beautiful (Beautiful)
If only you saw what I can see
You'll understand why I want you so desperately (Desperately)
Right now I'm looking at you and I can't believe
You don't know, oh-oh, you don't know you're beautiful
Oh-oh-oh, you don't know you're beautiful, oh-oh
That's what makes you beautiful

attributes.review: Disgusting experience downloading this atrocity. First of all you open the app and you see the phrase “keep america great...” baby do you know the state of this country rn??? This ain’t great at all and it has never been ever since weirdos started with the colonization and theft of native land ... oops I meant “founded this country” my apologies👀🤫🤭Dis da slums honey😔🤢🤮 we need help and this ain’t the “aid” we lookin for. it also gave me a headache so this app also serves as a major health risk. If I could give this app zero stars I would FOR SURE it has absolutely no purpose -1938473293039490959 out of 5 stars but that wasn’t an option sadly. Get this app deleted NEOWWWW!
attributes.title: Horrible... worst app ever

attributes.review: In this app i saw a number of disturbing things.There was a cheeto puff with a shrimp attached it was so inappropriate.There were racial slurs everywhere.I don’t wanna set that explain to the next generation.It was so embarrassing see my sister see that shrimp.DISCUSTING.

attributes.review: this app is ✨NOT✨ recommended😌 the cheeto puff threaten to flush my gold fish down the drain💫🧚 and i was also told my pet dinosaur will he put up for adoption and if he doesn’t get adopted he will be✨🦕slaughtered🦕✨ i payed good money for my dino and i’m not going to give him up now✨😌 also he took barron away from me😔 my love i shall see you again one day☺️✨💫🦕 please save my dino, fish, and BARRON😌✨💫🧚🦕💅🏻👉🏻👈🏻💀

attributes.review: This app is so disgusting I can’t even be on it for two seconds without gagging over 100 times. When I look at it start feel the throw up rise up from my butt to my stomach to my heart then to my throat 10 times per second. One time I was in the car with my beautiful girlfriend and saw the app on my screen and almost died cause of how my times I gagged, I literally couldn’t breath. Man you have to take this off the App Store for real it destroys my eyes when I look at it and I don’t feel safe when I have it on my phone. All my friends want to beat me up because I have it and literally nobody likes him, get this horrible app off the App Store ASAP🤮👎🏾.
attributes.title: This app makes me want to throw up
